tasks.title: Write JSON
tasks.code:
Imports System.Text.Json
Module P
  Sub Main()
    Dim obj = New With {.ok=True, .items=New Integer(){1,2,3}}
    Dim json = JsonSerializer.Serialize(obj, New JsonSerializerOptions With {.WriteIndented=True})
    My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText("data.json", json, False)
  End Sub
End Module

projects.title: To-Do CLI
projects.summary: Add/list tasks saved to a JSON file.

steps.title: Module1.vb
steps.code:
Imports System, System.Text.Json, System.IO
Module M
  Sub Main(args As String())
    Dim path="todo.json"
    Dim cmd=If(args.Length>0, args(0), "list")
    Dim items As List(Of Dictionary(Of String,Object))
    If File.Exists(path) Then
      items = JsonSerializer.Deserialize(Of List(Of Dictionary(Of String,Object)))(File.ReadAllText(path))
    Else
      items = New List(Of Dictionary(Of String,Object))()
    End If
    If cmd="add" AndAlso args.Length>1 Then
      items.Add(New Dictionary(Of String,Object) From {{"text", args(1)}, {"done", False}})
      File.WriteAllText(path, JsonSerializer.Serialize(items))
    ElseIf cmd="list" Then
      Dim i=1
      For Each it In items
        Dim mark = If(CBool(it("done")), "[x]", "[ ]")
        Console.WriteLine(i.ToString() & ". " & mark & " " & CStr(it("text")))
        i+=1
      Next
    Else
      Console.WriteLine("usage: add <text> | list")
    End If
  End Sub
End Module
